article.articlecontent:
I've let my blogging go by the wayside, so I'm jump starting it. I'm trying to incorporate a more sustainable model for writing the code. 

In this iteration I'm using Mavo.io to add in-browser editing. This allows me to create posts without getting into any code. I just go to the home feed, login to Github, and start creating a new post using Mavo's interface. 

![Screenshot that shows the Mavo.io interface](https://github.com/brianhaferkamp/scrapsofcode/blob/master/docs/assets/img/using-mavo-interface.jpg "Screenshot of the Mavo.io interface")
